data.text:
FACTS: @RyanSeacrest does not play around when it comes to gift giving. 🎄♥️

Watch the best unwrapping moments tonight at our iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Greatest Moments Special at 8/7c on @thecw! #iHeartGreatestMoments https://t.co/mJIdnuSgFO

Tonight we throw it all the way back to our favorite iHeartRadio Jingle Ball moments over the past 25 years! 

Share your favorite memories with us and relive them at 8/7c on @TheCW or https://t.co/h5nP0EUwRt! #iHeartGreatestMoments⁠ https://t.co/7Di79fdTVr

Looking back at our 11th Seacrest Studio opening at @APHospital in Orlando. So many memories made already... and this is just Day 1!

A new world awaits. So excited to see where the kids take it with their imagination! @RyanFoundation #SeacrestStudios11 https://t.co/EBKAOC0czW

Big thank you to @JustinBieber for surprising the kids and helping us launch our newest #SeacrestStudios at @APHospital in Orlando!

This is a day they’ll never forget. #SeacrestStudios11 https://t.co/oFl5PMbIbi

Today was the day! We officially launched #SeacrestStudios11 at @APHospital. We are so thankful for the teams who came together to make this virtual opening a reality. Special shout out to @justinbieber for joining our celebration! https://t.co/1C1pA8j36N
Thank you to our friends at @eatsnackpop for supporting @RyanFoundation’s mission to help young patients in hospitals across the country! #GivingTuesday  #Snackgiving https://t.co/mBLnjeyIyC
Did we sing along to your favorite holiday song yet? Don’t worry if not. There’s more #DisneyHolidaySingalong coming your way!
The holiday gift we all needed. @bts_bighit crushed it! #DisneyHolidaySingalong https://t.co/c8eCkViyFW

East Coast - show’s about to start on @ABCNetwork!

Who’s getting into the holiday spirit with us? Send us photos and videos from your karaoke party using #DisneyHolidaySingalong! https://t.co/mcu014Q5pO
Get cozy and warm up those vocals. #DisneyHolidaySingalong airs tonight at 8|7c on @ABCNetwork! https://t.co/SxcV4g45PA
It’s the most wonderful night of the year! Don’t miss @BTS_twt, @KatyPerry, @AdamLambert, and more TONIGHT at 8|7c on @ABCNetwork! #DisneyHolidaySingalong https://t.co/6mRcLJjCly

Tonight at 8|7c on ABC, the #DisneyHolidaySingalong is here with a sleigh full of stars like BTS, P!nk, Chloe x Halle, Ciara and more! 🎶 🎄 They'll be singing your favorite holiday songs with a touch of Disney magic. 💫 https://t.co/wocP9ua3Oi

‘Twas the night before Singalong, when all through the house, not a creature was stirring, except Mickey Mouse. 

Don’t miss #DisneyHolidaySingalong tomorrow night at 8|7c on @ABCNetwork! https://t.co/LXSFjAlWkN

Happy birthday @mileycyrus! 

So stoked to have her and @DuaLipa on the radio tomorrow morning to celebrate, talk #Prisoner and new music. Tune in at 8:25a PT! https://t.co/WfW8OXF2ld https://t.co/OG4bMGcdtm
Training for the upcoming marathon known as Thanksgiving https://t.co/7n5wgqXTJg
7 years ago. Remember this @jasonderulo? Time flies…. Happy birthday Seacrest Studios! @cincychildrens https://t.co/1MJiAO6X1K

My favorite kind of mornings. Today our listener Marlena got her bills paid for an ENTIRE YEAR! 

Got to surprise her with the big news, hear her story and how this will help. 2021 is already looking up for Marlena! https://t.co/ZK9Mv69U38

About to pay someone’s bills... for an entire year. Is it yours? 

Coming up next! Tune in: https://t.co/WfW8OXF2ld
... and birthday prizes are up for grabs at @Childrens Health in Dallas! https://t.co/3Pv8YYMKXc
The party decorations are up at @BostonChildrens! https://t.co/MkuEKHq1yC

Celebrating 2 big birthdays today... our Seacrest Studios at @BostonChildrens turns 6 and Seacrest Studios at @Childrens Health in Dallas turns 8! 

We're so grateful for everyone who made these Studios a place of healing for the young patients and their families. Thank you!

Even though we can't celebrate like usual, we still are excited to reign in #SeacrestStudios 6th birthday party, virtually! Thank you @RyanFoundation for your support and opportunities for endless smiles over the last six years! 🎉 🎈 https://t.co/CP9RHCihFt
2020 throwing in a Friday the 13th for some extra flavor https://t.co/xsuiShwUES

Found the announcement for our #DisneyHolidaySingalong this a.m. 

Don’t miss @BTS_twt, @KatyPerry, @AdamLambert, and MORE on November 30 on @ABCNetwork! https://t.co/ETdKvh8IrQ
Feeling festive already! I have big news tomorrow to get you into the holiday spirit, too. Stay tuned 🎄 https://t.co/ns0BIk158q
Patients loved meeting you, @iamlorengray! Thank you for spending time with us at @chocchildrens and @ChildrensNatl 💙 https://t.co/SakARQJ0br

I don’t know who needs to see this but.... #RockinEve

 https://t.co/N5tCrrBfLt
So a lot of you have been asking about my hair routine. Well... I’ve been secretly using my roommate’s shampoo @kellyripa https://t.co/LWaYbwmGt9

My dad Lieutenant Gary Seacrest (left) and my grandpa Major General Henry Skeen (right). So proud to have veterans in my family and grateful for all those who bravely served our country. Thank you! #VeteransDay https://t.co/8E7JcJSWcV
Something to look forward to in the new year. A new season of @AmericanIdol premieres February 14, 2021 on @ABCNetwork! #TheNextIdol https://t.co/zONh4iWKFo
It’s definitely too early Ryan! I told you to get through Thanksgiving first 🦃 (but I've had one up for a month now...more to come 🎄🎄🎄🎄) https://t.co/CtLR530cU7
Remembering Alex Trebek 💔 https://t.co/WKGpkl0QtN
I’m told it’s too early to put up a Christmas tree. Need you to weigh in on this @mariahcarey

Alex Trebek was like a family member who I watched every night. I remember going to the set to watch him tape a show before I started my TV career.  He was a big influence and one of a kind. Rest In Peace, Alex. https://t.co/B9wq95uRg4
Party favors have been delivered and the celebration continues…. happy 5th birthday to #SeacrestStudios at @ChildrensNatl in DC! https://t.co/Inl9AeJezs
Jumping right into our next birthday celebration! Happy 5th Birthday to Seacrest Studios at @ChildrensNatl! https://t.co/bdvyU7M4yz

Calling all LAUSD parents and students: are your grades suffering this year from distance learning? We want to hear from you!

https://t.co/PkQbosR9Tu
I’m much better at counting backwards into the new year #2021 https://t.co/x069AC5sia

Today marks 10 years since the first-ever Seacrest Studios opened at Egleston. To celebrate, our patients are walking the red carpet. Thank you, @RyanFoundation and @RyanSeacrest, for providing this endless source of fun, distraction and hope for our kids and their families! https://t.co/AoLnsYY7it

None of this would have been possible without our @childrensatl studio manager Wendy, the healthcare workers, interns, special guests, and of course, the kids who inspire us to dream big every day. 

HAPPY BIRTHDAY! #RSF10 #MemoriesOnTheMic @RyanFoundation https://t.co/HrZw8ES3Ik

Celebrating 30 years of @KellyRipa! She's a TV legend and NYC icon – it was an honor to surprise her with this special gift at one of her favorite places. Happy anniversary, Ripa! https://t.co/AiiHs5RFIM
